sources.title: Night Time in Nevada
sources.description: Twenty years earlier Farrell (Grant Withers) killed his mining partner Andrews. Now Andrews daughter (Adele Mara) arrives to get her father's trust fund. Farrell having rustled Roy's cattle now takes her money from her Lawyer and lets her overhear false information of their next rustling job. With the posse at the wrong location, his men attack the cattle train and Roy on board find himself greatly outnumbered.

sources.title: Nighttime in Nevada
sources.description: Title: Nighttime in Nevada Summary: The bad guy steals a gold mine from his partner and then murders him. Next he turns to rustling cattle. Directed by: William Witney Actors: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Adele Mara Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 5 September 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Twenty years earlier Farrell killed his mining partner Andrews. Now Andrews daughter arrives to get her father's trust fund. Farrell having rustled Roy's cattle now takes her money from her Lawyer and lets her overhear false information of their next rustling job. With the posse at the wrong location, his men attack the cattle train and Roy on board find himself greatly outnumbered.

sources.title: Night Time in Nevada (1948) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Adele Mara
Director: William Witney

The bad guy steals a gold mine from his partner and then murders him. Next he turns to rustling cattle.

metadata.Plot: Twenty years earlier Farrell killed his mining partner Andrews. Now Andrews daughter arrives to get her father's trust fund. Farrell having rustled Roy's cattle now takes her money from her Lawyer and lets her overhear false information of their next rustling job. With the posse at the wrong location, his men attack the cattle train and Roy on board find himself greatly outnumbered.
